Table of Contents

NAME

icbextractframe - extract single frame from image cube

SYNOPSIS

icbextractframe frame_num icbfile icpfile

DESCRIPTION

icbextractframe extracts a single frame from the image cube icbfile, writing it to the image component icpfile. frame_num denotes which frame in icbfile is to be extracted.

SEE ALSO

QccIMGImageCube(3) , QccIMGImageComponent(3) , QccPackIMG(3) , QccPack(3)

AUTHOR
